content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the panevėžys district court the case involves a divorce between an applicant rm and a defendant vm rm is seeking a divorce custody of their two children child maintenance and division of matrimonial property rm claims that vm started drinking and left the country not supporting the family the court has decided to divide the property equally between the parties with each receiving a 50 share of the apartment building and plot of land the court also considered the best interests of the children and temporarily deprived vm of parental authority the court relied on various documents and testimonies to establish the facts of the case the court ordered vm to pay stamp duty and costs to the state rm was granted legal aid and is required to pay a stamp duty as well

metadata.cost: 339.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 106.33 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
